Sr. Quality Assurance Analyst/Team Lead

This position is located at our head office in Milton, ON, Canada.

About the company:
SXC has built its business by offering a comprehensive
suite of software applications to the pharmaceutical
supply chain industry. SXC's products manage the
exchange of information at various stages in the
process of prescription filing, including: billing,
processing and payment of benefit claims between
healthcare providers and payers; retail and mail order
pharmacy drug dispensing and work-flow systems;
real-time switching of claims between pharmacies and
payers; contra-indication verifications between the
pharmacist and the patient; and valuable data mining
for payers, employers, and drug manufacturers. SXC's
software raises the efficacy and lowers the cost for
all participants in the supply-chain, with a focused
effort on raising the level of patient safety and
care.

Summary:
This position is responsible for the oversight of quality for all deliverables from the Open Systems development team. This includes Web, PC and UNIX based products. This position is responsible for defining and administering the QA process, from design reviews to software release. The person in this position must have excellent analysis skills, excellent knowledge of QA standards, procedures and implementation.

Educational Requirements:
Degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, or equivalent experience
